name: Xanthiom 2600 (In Development)
description:
Play the original Xanthiom as it would have been if released in 1981 for the Atari 2600! Play as Lieutenant Grisham on his first mission on Planet Coati 5!

Controls:

Joystick Left/Right: Move

Joystick Down: Select Missile

Joystick Up: Jump

Joystick Fire: Fire
